entry.summary: ...RESUSPENDED ASH FROM KATMAI-NOVARUPTA TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... entry.summary: ...Strong Cold Front Moving Across Eastern Interior Today... A strong cold front is moving across the Eastern Interior this morning.
